Title: The Dark Shaman
Description:
These dark shaman have been down here for months, raising beasts and performing dark rituals.

I don't know what they aim to achieve with all of this, but it's clear that they are no friend of the Horde. That's where you come in, $n.

Fight your way through the chasm and kill Dark Shaman Koranthal and Lava Guard Gordoth.
ObjectivesText: Defeat Dark Shaman Koranthal and Lava Guard Gordoth.
RewardText:
It would seem that the dark shaman experiments drove Gordoth insane.

Hopefully we've seen the last of this, $n.
